description:
Company Description:

Our client is a VC-funded startup revolutionizing business development with the power of generative AI. Founded by serial entrepreneurs, they are on a mission to transform the multi-billion dollar government business development space. This is your opportunity to join a unicorn in its earliest stages.

Opportunity Description:

If you thrive in dynamic, fast-paced startup environments and are passionate about building revolutionary products, we strongly encourage you to apply. Our client is on the hunt for a Principal AI Engineer with a strong startup background, someone who embodies the spirit of an entrepreneur and a product builder.

Their team is extremely dedicated and hard-working and they expect the same out of the people that they hire. This is a chance to challenge yourself, level up, and join an early-stage venture that is just beginning to take off.

How You Will Make An Impact:
• You will be given long periods of uninterrupted time to do what you do best.
• You will Implement a fully future gen AI structure that makes it impossible to escape the current multi-agentic framework.
• Assume leadership of new projects from conceptualization to deployment.
• Work with agile development methodologies, adhering to best practices and pursuing continued learning opportunities.

Required Skills and Qualifications:
• Most importantly: we are looking for the right cultural fit for our client. The ideal candidate is motivated, hungry, and ready to learn & build amazing things.
• They're looking for passionate individuals who love building products from the ground up.
• A background in startup environments is a must.
• 3+ years experience in artificial intelligence.
• An understanding of AI fundamentals (chains, generative AI, LLM's).
• The tech stack includes Supabase, Next.js, Langchain, LangGraph, TaskWeaver, AutoGen.
• Experience with multi-agentic frameworks, plan & respond patterns, multi-vector & multi-modal fusion retrieval techniques, and multi-agnostic layer patterns.
• An understanding of OpenAI and Mistral AI.
• Please note that all candidates must be United States Citizens in order to be considered for this position.

We are an equal-opportunity employer committed to a diverse workforce. We do not discriminate based on race, religion, color, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability.
